dict.string: Gathering money bags to recruit troops.
Gathering gold to update Heroes, defense and skills.
Hero Badao will automatically attack enemies as they are approaching.
Tap to release skills as enemies are approaching.
When Hero Badao' HP is low, move back and HP will increases a little automatically.
Hero Badao will automatically attack enemies only when he stops!
Upgrade logistics to speed money increase.
Upgrade Hero Badao for more HP and power.
Upgrade Dragon Blade to more power.
Huang Long day off Pa knife blade is the strongest scope of damage, so the fear of the enemy suffered a taste of it.
Fire Arrow Grid causing group damage.
Logistics Soliders power infantry with swords.
Enemy archers will attack you in far distance.
Enemy shield soldiers have more HP.
